graph_title: 국제기구 중 개발도상국 회원 및 투표권 비율 (기구별)
indicator_name: 국제기구에서 개도국의 회원 및 투표권 비율
target_name: 글로벌 국제경제 및 금융기관의 의사결정과정에서 개도국의 입장이 반영되도록 강화

en.target: Ensure enhanced representation and voice for developing countries in decision-making in global international economic and financial institutions in order to deliver more effective, credible, accountable and legitimate institutions
en.title: Proportion of members and voting rights of developing countries in international organizations
en.indicator_name: Proportion of members and voting rights of developing countries in international organizations
en.un_custodian_agency: United Nations Department of Economic and Social Affairs (DESA) / Financing for Development Office (FFDO)

en.graph_title: Proportion of members and voting rights of developing countries in international organizations
en.page_content: ▶ Data type: Estimated data by international organizations (Type2) This is Korean data prepared by international organizations through estimation and modeling. If there are no national data corresponding to UN SDGs indicators, international data are available for monitoring.
